name: Details and Bookings
description: Experience a classic sunset sail, one of the top ten things to do in Airlie Beach. Enjoy a relaxing evening as you sail across the bay, catching the breeze and soaking in the stunning sunset views. This intimate experience is perfect for those looking to unwind with a touch of elegance, complete with a welcome glass of bubbles and a delightful platter of cheese, bread, and seasonal fruit. Ideal for couples, friends, or small groups seeking a serene and stylish escape on the water.
includes:
Free glass of bubbles upon boarding.
Cheese, bread and nibbles platter (with seasonal fruit).
We suggest bringing warm clothes and a jacket in winter months.
Please note; As we're fully licensed, we don't allow any BYOG.
highlights:
Sail across the bay at sunset.
Voted one of the top ten things to do in Airlie.
Welcome glass of bubbles.
Cheese, bread, and seasonal fruit platter.
Intimate experience with a maximum of 24 guests.
ideal_for: Couples, friends, and small groups looking for a relaxing and stylish evening on the water.
